original_text: Sometimes in the morning the sky is red and there are dark clouds. Then you say, “Today there will be a storm.” So you look at the sky and you know what the weather will be. But special things are happening now. And you do not understand what they mean.
korean_text: 아침에 하늘이 붉고 흐리면 오늘은 날이 궂겠다 하나니 너희가 날씨는 분별할 줄 알면서 시대의 표적은 분별할 수 없느냐

sentences.original_text: Sometimes in the morning the sky is red
Today there will be a storm
So you look at the sky
and you know what the weather will be
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 날씨가 어떨지 알 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: But special things are happening now
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 특별한 일들이 지금 일어나고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: And you do not understand what they mean
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 당신은 그것들이 무엇을 의미하는지 이해하지 못합니다
